name: CodeTactic Media Inc.
address: CodeTactic Media Inc., 418 East Kent Ave S #119, Vancouver, BC V5X 2X7

featured_reviews.review_id: We had a great experience working with the code tactic media. They understood the need of our business really well and provide a ongoing support. They take care of our needs right away, and Gonzalo has great communication skills. He listens carefully to the customer feedback and always incorporate into his design decisions.
featured_reviews.review_text: We had a great experience working with the code tactic media. They understood the need of our business really well and provide a ongoing support. They take care of our needs right away, and Gonzalo has great communication skills. He listens carefully to the customer feedback and always incorporate into his design decisions.

featured_reviews.review_id:
CodeTactic built my website two years ago. Throughout the entire process, all promises to fulfill and execute deadlines were met. Technical language and systems were explained in a clear manner for someone without their background to grasp.

CodeTactic ensured to understand my history, goals, and overall vision of what I needed my website to communicate. They took the time to ask all the questions necessary to ensure that we were always on the same page. Anytime I had questions and issues with anything they were quick to reply and provide solutions.

The end result is CodeTactic delivered on what they promised. I loved what they created. They have built me a website that I am proud to own. The website is an accurate reflection of the high quality of my business.

Their customer service continues to be quick, accurate, and helpful whenever I have a question with my site.

I would highly recommend CodeTactic to anyone who is searching for a company to take care of such an important part of their business goals!

Yohannes Petros
Founder/Owner - Hanes Hummus

featured_reviews.review_id:
It was a great experience working with the CodeTactic team. They translated designs and ideas well, and were very responsive throughout pur website design process. They were helpful with post-launch troubleshooting as well.

Best wishes to the CodeTactic team

featured_reviews.review_id: CodeTactic helped our company rebrand and create a personalized website for our specific needs. They are very professional and quality of work is as requested. Gonzalo in particular has gone above and beyond to ensure our website functioned the way we liked. They have definitely been able to help our company grow. Overall great company, quick response and great quality work. Highly recommend!
featured_reviews.review_text: CodeTactic helped our company rebrand and create a personalized website for our specific needs. They are very professional and quality of work is as requested. Gonzalo in particular has gone above and beyond to ensure our website functioned the way we liked. They have definitely been able to help our company grow. Overall great company, quick response and great quality work. Highly recommend!

featured_reviews.review_id: One word "Professional".  I had previously used a freelance web designer that made a half baked site.  A few years later when I decided that our company needed to make some changes to our online portal, I couldn't find the original web guy... Lesson learned. I found CodeTactic after talking to a few collegues as I needed a professional web development company.  The experience was fantastic the website far exceeded my expectations.  Highly recommend staying away from freelance designers.

featured_reviews.review_id: Excellent customer service, great response to any demands or changes and top notch in content creation! Highly recommended.
